The graphics still holds good even in 2020.But the shooting system is what I hated about this game.Enemies just pop up and you have to start shooting without any real tactic,cover based shooting system.The sky hook idea is good but this game was a let down for me,especially after all the hype i've heard.Sadly I installed this after a month from purchase and was unable to request a refund :-(
好想伊丽莎白。

“布克，你害怕神吗？”
“不，我害怕你。”


如果有一部游戏再一次让人打开时即感到想玩下去又不想玩下去的的话，无限可能不是唯一一个让我这么想的游戏，但是绝对是最先想起来的游戏。
13年的游戏到了现在依然能惊艳四座，时至今日它仍然是游戏界的典范，当之无愧是第九艺术的的经典。无论是从艺术风格还是剧情上。美丽清新的哥伦比亚，幽暗又迷离的销魂城，以及那个一直跟在身边女孩，都是让人难忘的风景。伊丽莎白的游戏和剧情人格塑造思路值得现在的游戏去学习。

对于剧情不进行描述，不希望打扰任何一个没有体验过游戏的人的游戏体验。





如果有可能，我希望我没去打扰那个再海岸边起舞的女孩，
早早的关掉游戏，让她就一直留在那里吧。

抱歉，没能亲自带你去巴黎。

Шедевр на века полный моря недостатков; сюжет не идеален, не всегда строен и достаточно наивен порой, но как сильно он может бить по эмоциям, мама не горюй. Графен, боже упаси. Эти розы на каждом кусте никогда не приму, но стиль, стиль решает все. Работа со светом, музыкой, звуком, диалогами, все прекрасно. Выбор слов, которые говорят персонажи, порой, вызывают мурашки, а концовка просто бомба. Несовершенная шутерная составляющая, конечно, может сильно задолбать, особенно в финальной битве, где уже нет никакого желания продираться через месево врагов и отсутствие хоть какого-то импакта от стрельбы по ним, оставляющей после себя какое-то фрустрирующее огорчение. Энергетиков много, оружия много, и все это разнообразие просто ни к чему. Хорошо еще есть ачивки, а то многие механики игры я так и не увидел бы, потому что их все пробовать даже и не хочется. Но Кен Левин сделал куда больше для всей индустрии, чем просто пару несовершенных игр с хорошими идеями, но скудной реализацией. Он вдохновил многих разработчиков использовать его идеи и архетипы геймплея и сюжетов, чтобы у нас было много куда более совершенных, чем его, игр, от тех же Аркейн. И за это ему Гаргантюозное спасибо.

Un juego muy divertido tal y como sus precuelas y con una historia, a mi parecer, muy buena.
Los unico cambio negativo que note fue el de solo tener 2 armas a la vez pues muchas veces hacia falta municion o se hechaba en falta cierto tipo de arma para ciertas situaciones.
Probably one of the best written stories and it still holds up 7 years later, and then the gameplay is solid  and fast paced but slow when it needs to be, its a little slice of gaming perfection.
Muy buen juego, lo recomiendo.

As a fan of the whole Bioshock franchise, I defintely like this game. It departs from the previous games as it happens in a completely differnt setting, but the whole City in the Clouds concept is very well rendered. 
The story and characters are good and well developed (the end was a bit confusing to me, though). 
I like the SFX effects a lot, some are very original and add a lot to the feeling and immersion.
Very fun game with minor RPG elements and a great and deep lore that link to the previous games in the series.

This is a great story-focused shooter. This games covers topics ranging from class struggles to the idea of parallel universes. I have played through the game enough times to get all of the achievements and still come back to play through it again. It is so much fun getting to run through and experience Columbia over and over again. The different locations are detailed and interesting to explore. This game also includes a dlc arcade style game Clash in the Clouds and then two smaller campaigns, Burial at Sea Episodes 1 and 2. I personally find that Burial at Sea is a decent standalone experience and a nice reference to the first BioShock games. CitC is fun to go through once but doing all the blue ribbon challenges to 100% the game blows. Overall, this is an very enjoyable game and a solid end to the current BioShock series.

Après avoir fini le jeu, je me dois de donner mon avis sur ce jeu. Pourquoi ? Au vu des tests et commentaires dithyrambiques je m'attendais à un chef d'oeuvre. Force est de constater que je suis très déçu. Je suis allé au bout par principe. 

Oui, comme vous pouvez lire ça et là, l'histoire est sympa sans être extraordinaire. L'intrigue abuse de la carotte et du bâton. C'est utilisé à outrance dans le scénario et on a vite fait de le remarquer et de s'en lasser. Je le classerai dans les Visual Novels moyens. 

Côté fun, c'est juste horrible. C'est soit un FPS nul et ultra-répétitif (mêmes ennemis, environnements, patterns, etc.) soit un jeu d'exploration à la première personne et là, on fait rigoureusement la même chose de la 5ième minute à la dernière heure: fouiller des tiroirs et trouver des crochets. 

Il plait parce que les choix de départ des développeurs sont bons mais passé le cap du début, terminé, la magie n'opère plus. Entendons nous bien, ce n'est pas un mauvais jeu mais certainement pas un jeu qui vaut 30€ sur Steam. Pour moi, c'est un petit jeu sympa. Il y a des visuals novels assumés qui sont bien plus travaillés et captivants pour bien moins cher.
bom d+,eu curti a gameplay,a historia e tudo mais,excelente jogo!
Una obra maestra , la mejor historia que he jugado en mi vida, grande Ken Levine.

Shallow so so shallow. Definitly not a 'shock' game. It's just really bad, both gamepaly wise and narrative wise. Sure the narrative has an interesting premise but it's sorely lacking in execution. There's way better games in the genre out there so I'd stay away from this even if it would be free. Your time is better spent elsewhere.

This was another impulse purchase made because the game was on sale, and looked fun enough. Hoooooooly crap, what an understatement that ended up being! The gameplay is mechanically solid and combat is pretty fun, albeit tricky on the harder difficulties. However, the main driving force behind this game and the reason I wholeheartedly recommend it is the story. What a ride it is! Set against a gorgeous, awesome visual backdrop, there is so much to love about the sheer grip this game will take upon you. You will be like me, eager to finish one more chapter and then ending up in the wee hours of the morning, unable to take your eyes or mind off of where the story takes you. Definitely worth buying, and an absolute steal during a sale!

Wow, what an experience - I've had this sitting for a while, saving for a rainy day. It was like living through the best dystopian movie of all time. I played right after bioshock 2, and I'm glad I did-- I don't think i'd go back to the older games after playing this. Also ties into bioshock one a bit... Pick it up with the expansions as well, you are GOING to want them and the gameplay in them are fun an different enough.

Probably an underrated game. It's hard to keep the challenge for the player after Bioshock 1 and 2, but the idea of making a whole new game, really gets it. At least a speaking main character. A simple way to use weapons, and awesome graphics and scenarios.

Maybe a not so good point, sometimes you can get lost flying in the air-rails. But all in all, a must have game for sure.
